trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects, which is used when the connections are declared in content pages and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control is declared in a master page.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una raccolta di static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> gli oggetti, che viene utilizzato quando le connessioni vengono dichiarate nelle pagine di contenuto e <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo viene dichiarato in una pagina master.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection class is used in a specific development scenario.
trans-unit.target: La classe ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection viene utilizzata in uno scenario di sviluppo specifico.

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts application uses master pages, with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control declared in a master page, and individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects declared in content pages as static connections, the ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection class is used.
trans-unit.target: Se un'applicazione Web part utilizza pagine master, con la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo dichiarato in una pagina master e singoli <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>gli oggetti dichiarati nelle pagine di contenuto come connessioni statiche, viene usata la classe ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In the content pages, multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> controls can be declared, which differs from the ordinary rule that only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control can be declared on a page.
trans-unit.target: Nelle pagine di contenuto, più <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controlli possono essere dichiarati, che differisce dalla regola normale di un solo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo può essere dichiarato in una pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control on a content page can contain a `<StaticConnections>` element, and this element can contain one or more declared `<asp:webpartconnection>` elements.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controllo in una pagina di contenuto può contenere un `<StaticConnections>` elemento e questo elemento può contenere uno o più dichiarato `<asp:webpartconnection>` elementi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection class is used by the Web Parts control set to create a collection of all the static connections declared in each content page, and these collections are ultimately added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> collection in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: La classe ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection viene utilizzata dal controllo Web part per creare un insieme di tutte le connessioni statiche dichiarate in ogni pagina contenuto e queste raccolte vengono aggiunti alla fine il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>insieme il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection class is used to create the collection of static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects that is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La classe ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection viene utilizzata per creare la raccolta di static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetti a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to add new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects to an existing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Add per aggiungere nuovi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetti esistente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that indicates where the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> was inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che indica dove il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> è stato inserito nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se un particolare <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto esiste nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object and determine whether it is in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Contains consente di verificare un particolare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>dell'oggetto e determinare se è presente in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> being checked for its existence in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> viene verificata la presenza di una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: if value exists in the collection; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se value presente nella raccolta; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia la raccolta in una matrice di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method is useful when you want to create a custom array to programmatically manipulate a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CopyTo è utile quando si desidera creare una matrice personalizzata per modificare a livello di codice un insieme di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetti in cui viene copiata insieme.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che indica il punto iniziale nella matrice in corrispondenza del quale inserire il contenuto della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione di un membro specifico della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method is useful when you want to know the ordinal position (index) of one object relative to the others in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Metodo IndexOf è utile quando si desidera conoscere la posizione ordinale (indice) di un oggetto rispetto agli altri in una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> che fa parte della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che indica la posizione di un oggetto specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto nella raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: If `index` equals the number of items in the collection, then `value` is appended to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se `index` è uguale al numero di elementi nella raccolta, quindi `value` viene aggiunto alla fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating the ordinal position in the collection at which a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che indica la posizione ordinale nella raccolta in corrispondenza del quale un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> deve essere inserito.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> da inserire nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects can be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> gli oggetti possono essere aggiunti alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if connection objects cannot be added to the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se non è possibile aggiungere oggetti connessione all'insieme. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a connection item within the collection, based on an index number indicating the item's location in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un elemento di connessione all'interno della raccolta, in base a un numero di indice che indica la posizione dell'elemento nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Item property enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> collection by using an index number that represents the item's ordinal position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà dell'elemento consente di accedere a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetto all'interno di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection>insieme con un numero di indice che rappresenta la posizione ordinale nella raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the index of a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che indica l'indice di un membro della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns a specific member of the collection according to a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro specifico della raccolta in base a un identificatore univoco.

trans-unit.source: This property returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object with the specified ID by performing a case-insensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetto con l'ID specificato eseguendo un confronto tra maiuscole e minuscole.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of a particular connection in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'ID di una determinata connessione nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The first whose ID matches the value of the id parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il primo il cui ID corrisponde al valore della id parametro.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se viene trovata alcuna corrispondenza.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per rimuovere l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetto dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow the specified item are then moved up in the collection to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Tutti gli elementi che seguono l'elemento specificato vengono spostati verso l'alto nella raccolta per riempire la posizione rimasta vuota.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Vengono aggiornati anche gli indici degli elementi spostati.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> da rimuovere.
